hero.badge: 1st Marketplace in the world sell and buy companies worldwide
hero.description: Welcome to Sharekte - Your marketplace for buying and selling established, revenue-generating companies globally. Skip the startup phase and step into profitability.

browseSection.title: Browse Sharekte Marketplace
browseSection.description: Explore Sharekte's complete marketplace of verified, profitable businesses. Filter by country and incorporation year to find your perfect match.

featured.title: Featured Companies
featured.description: Browse established businesses ready for acquisition
featured.noCompanies: No companies available at this time

featuredSection.title: Featured on Shareket
featuredSection.description: Handpicked, profitable companies featured on Sharekte, ready for immediate acquisition

featuresSection.title: Why Choose Sharekte
featuresSection.description: Comprehensive tools and support for acquiring and managing your businesses through Sharekte
featuresSection.feature1Desc: Access thousands of verified, revenue-generating businesses from around the world through Sharekte.
featuresSection.feature2Desc: Real financial data, growth trajectories, and proven business models you can analyze on Sharekte.
featuresSection.feature3Desc: Escrow protection, legal documentation, and buyer safeguards on every purchase on Sharekte.
featuresSection.feature4Desc: Sharekte's dedicated advisors guide you through due diligence and acquisition process.
featuresSection.feature5Desc: Comprehensive analytics and management tools for the companies you own on Sharekte.
featuresSection.feature6Desc: Quick handoff and transition support to get your business running smoothly through Sharekte.

howitworks.title: How Sharekte Works
howitworks.description: Simple steps to acquire your next business on Sharekte
howitworks.step1Desc: Explore Sharekte's marketplace of verified, profitable businesses
howitworks.step2Desc: Review detailed financials, metrics, and business models on Sharekte
howitworks.step3Desc: Work with Sharekte advisors to finalize terms with sellers
howitworks.step4Desc: Access your Sharekte dashboard and scale your business portfolio

whyBuy.title: Why Buy a Ready-Made Company?
whyBuy.subtitle: Skip the startup grind. Get established businesses that generate revenue from day one with proven models and experienced teams.

time.title: Time Savings
time.description: Skip years of development and get to profitability fast

capital.title: Capital Savings

profitability.title: Day 1 Profitability

lowRisk.title: Proven Model

team.title: Ready Operations

global.title: Global Opportunity
global.description: Acquire UK, Swedish, US companies without travel or relocation

cta.title: Ready to Buy Your First Company?

salesSection.title: Become an Entrepreneur Right Now

cta.title: Ready to Own Your Next Business?

features.title: Professional Features Built for Success
features.subtitle: We provide everything you need to buy or sell established businesses with confidence, security, and professional support at every step

verified.title: Verified Sellers & Buyers
verified.description: All participants are thoroughly verified to ensure trust and credibility in every transaction

secure.title: Secure Transactions
secure.description: Advanced encryption and escrow services protect your investment and ensure safe transactions

global.title: Global Marketplace
global.description: Buy and sell established businesses worldwide with support for multiple currencies and payment methods

support.title: 24/7 Professional Support
support.description: Direct WhatsApp support, expert consultations, and dedicated account managers for every deal

legal.title: Legal Documentation
legal.description: Automated transfer forms, legal compliance, and professional documentation for all transactions

fast.title: Fast & Efficient Process
fast.description: Complete business transfers in days, not months, with streamlined workflows and automated processes

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Real-time dashboards, performance metrics, and business insights for informed decisions

trusted.title: Industry Trusted
trusted.description: Thousands of successful transactions with verified businesses generating real revenue

escrow.title: Transparent Escrow Service
escrow.description: Protected fund handling ensures both parties feel secure throughout the transaction

verified_business.title: Revenue-Verified Businesses
verified_business.description: All businesses are verified for active operations and genuine revenue streams

consultation.title: Expert Consultation
consultation.description: Free consultations with business experts to guide you through the entire acquisition process

handover.title: Complete Handover Support
handover.description: Full transition support from purchase to operational handover ensures business continuity
